title: Elementary Mathematics Instructional Design Utilizing Learner-Generated Multimedia Wikis

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: A professional development program for current elementary school teachers, focusing on constructing a wiki-based collaborative learning environment using smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can create multimedia content (images/videos/audio) explaining mathematical concepts on a wiki platform
Learners can derive three or more mathematical problem-solving strategies by analyzing peer-generated wiki texts

Learners can apply two instructional methods for the four core domains of elementary mathematics (number operations, geometry, measurement, patterns) in actual classes through wiki-based collaborative learning

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
